title: About
text: Javed is a Water Resources Engineer and Graduate Research Assistant in the Coastal Risks and Engineering Lab at University of Central Florida (UCF). His work involves multi-hazards risk assessment and analyzing compound climate/weather extreme events and their spatio-temporal interactions and socio-economic impacts using machine learning and statistical methods.

title: About
text:
